
Section 3 : Facetting
===========================

### Section 3 Faceting


```{r}

qplot(cty,data=Mpg2,geom="histogram",binwidth=2)
+ facet_grid(cyl ~ drv)

````
Margins Faceting a plot is like creating a contingency table. 
It is often useful to display marginal totals as well the individual cells
